Tour du Rwanda Karongi-Musanze

Etape: Karongi-Musanze
Km: 138.7
Isaha yo guhaguruka: 10:00
Umubare w'abakinnyi: 72

Umwanditsi : Ngabo Roben na Ishimwe Israel

Amafoto : Niyonzima Moïse

Uko isiganwa riri kugenda

14:24

Kuwa kane, 28.02.2019

Ibihembo byatanzwe

Umwenda utangwa na Skol uhabwa uwegukanye agace:Ghirmay Biniyam (Érythrée)

Umwenda w'Umuhondo utangwa na Minispoc uhabwa uri imbere ku rutonde rusange: Merhawi Kudus (Astana Pro Team)

Umwenda utangwa na Cogebanque uhabwa urusha abandi guterera imisozi: Mugisha Moise (Team Rwanda)

Umwenda w'urusha abandi Sprint utangwa na SP: Du Plooy Rohan (Pro-Touch)

Umwenda w'umukinnyi ukiri muto witwaye neza utangwa na Prime Insurance Ltd: Didier Munyaneza (Benediction Club)

Umwenda w'urusha abandi guhangana utangwa na Rwanda Tea: Guillornet Adrien (Interpro Cycling Academy)

Umwenda w'umunya-Afurika uri imbere uhembwa na RwandaAir: Merhawi Kudus (Astana Pro Team, Erythree)

Umwenda w'umunyarwanda uri imbere ku rutonde rusange utangwa na RDB: Didier Munyaneza (Benediction Club)

Ikipe yahize izindi yahembwe umwenda w'Inyange Industries: (Astana Pro Team)

14:20

Kuwa kane, 28.02.2019

Uko bakurikiranye ku rutonde rusange rukiyobowe na Kudus

2. Rein Taaramae – 17:33’54’’

3. Matteo Badialatti – 17:34’22’’

4. Aguirre Ricardo – 17:34’37’’

5. Tesfom Sirak – 17:37’51’’

14:10

Kuwa kane, 28.02.2019

Umwenda w'umuhondo uragumanwa na Merhawi Kudus

Umunnya-Érythrée ukinira Astana Pro Team niwe ucyambaye umwenda w'umuhondo ugaragaza uri imbere ku rutonde rusange. Gusa mu gace ka gatanu yasoreje ku mwanya wa 30 asizwe iminota itatu n'amasegonda 17 n'itsinda ryasoreje imbere

14:08

Kuwa kane, 28.02.2019

Uko bakurikiranye

1.Ghirmay Biniyam (Érythrée): 03h42'01
2.Areruya Joseph (Delko Marseille Provence): 03h42'01
3.Turek Daniel (Israel Cycling Academy): 03h42'01
4.Munyaneza Didier (Benediction Club): 03h42'01
5.Bellicaud Jeremy (u Bufaransa U23): 03h42'01

13:57

Kuwa kane, 28.02.2019

Biniyam Ghirmay wegukanye aka gace niwe muto kurusha abandi muri iri rushanwa

Igihugu cya Érythrée gikomeje kuba iwabo w'umukino w'amagare muri Afurika. Umwana w'imyaka 18 n'iminsi 318 niwe utsinze agace ka Gatanu. Niwe mukinnyi muto kurusha abandi muri iri siganwa

13:48

Kuwa kane, 28.02.2019

AGAHINDA KU BANYARWANDA, Agace ka gatanu kegukanywe na Biniam Girmay ukomoka muri Érythrée

Abanyarwanda biriwe imbere bakoresha imbaraga nyinshi ariko agace ka gatanu ka Tour du Rwanda kegukanywe na Biniam Girmay ukinira ikipe y'igihugu ya Érythrée. Arushije Sprint Areruya Joseph, Ndayisenga Valens na bagenzi babo bari kumwe.

13:44

Kuwa kane, 28.02.2019

Mu bilometero bitatu bya nyuma Valens Ndayisenga acomotse mu bari imbere

Ndayisenga bita Rukara acomotse mu gikundi n'imbaraga nyinshi. Valens Ndayisenga ashoboye gutsindira i Musanze byaba ari inshuro ya gatatu kuko yarabikoze mu 2013 na 2014 mu duce twavaga i Rwamagana dusorezwa hano i Musanze

13:39

Kuwa kane, 28.02.2019

Harabura ibilometero 15 ngo basoze, Amahirwe ku banyarwanda

Mugisha Moise yari agerageje gucomoka mu gikundi cy'abakinnyi 11 bari imbere ariko bahise bamushyikira byihuse. 11 bari imbere harimo abanyarwanda batandatu, bivuga ko bakoranye neza amahirwe yo kwegukana aka gace ari ayabo

13:31

Kuwa kane, 28.02.2019

Nyuma y'aka gace Mugisha Moise niwe wambikwa na Cogebanque umwenda w'uhiga abandi mu misozi

Mugisha Moise usanzwe ukinira Skol Fly Cycling Club uri gukinira Team Rwanda muri iri siganwa niwe uza kwambikwa umwenda utangwa na Cogebanque uranga urusha abandi kuzamuka nyuma yo kwitwara neza mu musozi wa nyuma w'ka gace.

Uyu mwenda awambuye umunya-Espagne TORRES Pablo ukinira Interpro Cycling Academy wari uwambaye uyu munsi.

Mugisha Moise also takes the 2 Intermediate Sprint of the day!Results:

13:23

Kuwa kane, 28.02.2019

Gufatanya kw'abanya-Érythrée?

Abakinnyi ba Érythrée, Yakob Debesay na Mulueberhan bavuye mu gikundi bajyana na Merhawi Kudus ukinira Astana Pro Team ariko bakomoka mu gihugu kimwe. Ubu bari mu bilometero 25 bya nyuma. Bagiye gushaka uko bagabanya ibihe basizwe n'abakinnyi 12 bari imbere.

13:06

Kuwa kane, 28.02.2019

ABANYARWANDA BABIRI BASEZEYE MU ISIGANWA

Jean Claude Uwizeye na Hakiruwizeye Samuel bakinira Team Rwanda ntabwo bashoboye gukomeza isiganwa. Bashobora kuba bagize ikibazo cy'uburwayi cyangwa bananiwe kubera umuvuduko waryo. Impamvu turacyayikurikirana.

Jean Claude Uwizeye wazamukiye i Rwamagana muri Les Amis Sportifs yakinaga Tour du Rwanda ye ya karindwi, naho Hakiruwizeye Samuel bita Cyihebe we ni inshuro ya gatatu.

12:43

Kuwa kane, 28.02.2019

Igikundi gitangiye gukoresha imbaraga nyinshi basatira abari imbere

Ubu abari imbere biganjemo abanyarwanda batangiye gusatirwa n'igikundi.Ikinyuranyo cyavuye ku minota itatu irenga, ubu hasigayemo iminota ibiri n'amasegonda 45

12:36

Kuwa kane, 28.02.2019

Amakorosi ateye ubwoba ku bakinnyi, umuhanda mushya unogeye ijisho ku bakunzi b'umukino(Amafoto)

Umuhanda mushya unyura mu karere ka Rutsiro wanyuzemo Tour du Rwanda uyu munsi uri gufasha abantu gutembera no kureba ibyiza bitatse u Rwanda. Amafoto ya IGIHE aragufasha kwihera ijisho uko byifashe

12:23

Kuwa kane, 28.02.2019

Tubibutse abakinnyi 12 bari imbere

Abakinnyi 12 barasatira agace ka Pfunda aho bahita bafata umuhanda ujya i Musanze. Abakinnyi bayoboye isiganwa ni; Daniel Turek, Patrick Byukusenge, Langat, Areruya Joseph, Biniam Girmay, Didier Munyaneza, Guillonnet,
Mugisha Moise, Hailemichael Mulu, Bellicaud, Valens Ndayisenga na Manizabayo Eric bita Karadiyo.

12:11

Kuwa kane, 28.02.2019

Amafoto y'igare mu misozi ya Rutsiro

12:10

Kuwa kane, 28.02.2019

Mugisha Moise yegukanye amanota yo mu musozi wa Gakeri

Mu musozi wa gatatu w'ahazamuka, Mugisha Moise niwe uhageze ari imbere. Akurikiwe na Guillonnet Adrien naho Areruya Joseph na Ndayisenga Valens baza bakurikiye

12:07

Kuwa kane, 28.02.2019

Uburyohe bwa Tour du Rwanda ni abafana

Abanyamahanga bitabira Tour du Rwanda bishimira cyane imifanire, uburyo abakunzi b'umukino wo gusiganwa ku magare baba bari ku mihanda mu gihe cy'isiganwa. Umwe muribo, ni Merhawi Kudus wambeye umwenda w'umuhondo.
Mbere yo gutangira aka gace yabwiye IGIHE ko niyegukana iri siganwa azishima cyane kubera abafana. Yagize ati: ''Iri siganwa ririhariye. Kuba dusanga abafana benshi ku mihanda aho duca hose biryoshya isiganwa muri rusange. Ninshobora kuryegukana nzarizirikana iteka.''

11:55

Kuwa kane, 28.02.2019

Gishwati- Igikundi kirimo Merhawi Kudus gikomeje gusigara

Abasiganwa bari imbere binjiye muri Pariki ya Gishwati. 11 bari imbere basize igikundi iminota itatu n'amasegonda atandatu

11:34

Kuwa kane, 28.02.2019

Ntabwo umuvuduko uraba mwinshi

Ubu abasiganwa bari kugendera ku muvuduko wa 32.5Km/H. Bivuga ko isiganwa ritihuta cyane. Kuko hari n'ubwo rigera ku muvuduko wa 46Km/H

11:31

Kuwa kane, 28.02.2019

Kubura ubuhanga bwo kumanuka bitumye Mulu asigwa n'abari imbere

Mu gace k'imisozi miremire abakinnyi bazamuka baba bahabwa amahirwe ariko ubuhanga mu kumanuka nta bwoba bugirwa na bake nabwo bugira uruhare mu gutanga intsinzi.

Umunya Ethiopia Hailemichael Mulu wari mu bakinnyi b'imbere arasigaye kuko atagendeye ku muvuduko nk'uwabo mu kumanuka imisozi yo mu murenge wa Ruhango wo mu karere ka Rutsiro.

11:17

Kuwa kane, 28.02.2019

Amanota yo mu musozi wa Congo-Nile yegukanywe na Hailemichael Mulu

Abasiganwa bari imbere baminutse umusozi wa Congo-Nile. Uwageze ku gasongero kawo ari imbere ni Hailemichael Mulu ukinira Dimension Data. Abamukurikiye ni; Mugisha Moise wa Team Rwanda, na Biniam Girmay Hailu. Aba n'abandi umunani, basize igikundi iminota ibiri n'amasegonda 50

11:11

Kuwa kane, 28.02.2019

Abasiganwa bari kuzamuka umusozi wa kabiri utangirwaho amanota y'ahazamuka

Abasiganwa 12 bari gusatira akajyi ka 'Congo-Nile'. Aha niho haza gutangirwa amanota y'umukinnyi uzamuka kurusha abandi, aho uwitwaye neza ahembwa na Cogebanque. Abari imbere ubu barasiga igikundi iminota ibiri n'amasegonda 30

11:02

Kuwa kane, 28.02.2019

Abakinnyi 12 bacomotse mu gikundi bagisize iminota ibiri n'amasegonda 12

Igikundi kirimo Merhawi Kudus wambaye umwenda w'umuhondo kimaze kwinjira mu karere ka Rutsiro. Ariko kirasigwa na 12 bari imbere barimo Valens Ndayisenga, Areruya Joseph, Didier Munyaneza na Mugisha Moise b'abanyarwanda. Bari kumwe na Daniel Turek wa Israel Cycling Academy, na Geoffrey Kiprotich Langat wa Kenya, n'abandi. Ikinyuranyo ubu ni 2'12

10:44

Kuwa kane, 28.02.2019

Ubushyuhe ni bwinshi mu gace ka none

Kuko ibilometero byinshi by'agace ka Gatanu ka Tour du Rwanda biri gukinirwa mu duce tw'uruhererekane rw'imisozi iri ku butumburuke bwo hejuru, ubushyuhe ni bwinshi nubwo nta zuba rihari

10:29

Kuwa kane, 28.02.2019

Abakinnyi 9 bari imbere harimo Areruya Joseph

Amanota yo mu musozi wa mbere w'isiganwa, i Nyamuhembe bahageze imbere hari abakinnyi icyenda, amanota y'uwahageze mbere yegukanwa na Mugisha Moise, akurikirwa na Mulu Hailemichael w'umunya-Ethiopia, Areruya Joseph aza inyuma yabo.

— Tour du Rwanda???????? (@Tour_du_Rwanda) February 28, 2019


10:24

Kuwa kane, 28.02.2019

Merhawi Kudus na mugenzi we bakoze impanuka idakomeye

Mu gihe basohokaga mu Mujyi wa Karongi, abakinnyi babiri ba Astana Pro Team, Merhawi Kudus wambaye umwenda w'umuhondo na mugenzi we Rodrigo Contreras Pinzón bakoze impanuka bagwa iruhande rw'umuhanda ariko bahise babyuka bakomeza urugendo

10:03

Kuwa kane, 28.02.2019

Agace ka Gatanu ka Tour du Rwanda 2019 karatangiye

Abakinnyi bahagurutse ni 72 nibo bahagurutse i Karongi berekeza i Musanze

09:41

Kuwa kane, 28.02.2019

Icyo amateka avuga ku duce dusorezwa i Musanze

Kuri sprint, Umudage Julian Hellmann niwe wegukanye agace kasorejwe i Musanze muri Tour du Rwanda y’umwaka ushize, ariko ntibyabuza Mugisha Samuel kugumana umwenda w’umuhondo.

Mu nshuro umunani Akarere ka Musanze kamaze gusorezwamo uduce twa Tour du Rwanda, enye zegukanywe n’abanyarwanda, Valens Ndayisenga 2013 na 2014, Jean Bosco Nsengimana mu 2015 na Areruya Joseph mu 2017.

09:41

Kuwa kane, 28.02.2019

Ni urugendo rw’amasaha hafi ane

Niba udukurikiranye, wamenya ko umukinnyi wa mbere biteganyijwe ko asesekara i Musanze mu masaha ya saa 13:47.
Abatuye i Musanze baza kuba bategerereje imbere y’isoko rishya ry’aka karere bashobora kuza kuryoherwa na Sprint isoza agace k’uyu munsi.

09:39

Kuwa kane, 28.02.2019

Imiterere y’intera ya Gatanu ya Tour du Rwanda 2o19


Aka gace ka Karongi – Musanze gafite intera ya kilometero 138.7. Inzira iri siganwa ryanyuzemo ejo riva i Rubavu riza i Karongi yiganjemo kumanuka imisozi ya Rutsiro, niyo riribusubiremo, noneho bayizamuka.

Abasiganwa bagiye guhaguruka i Karongi basohokere i Rubengera bafate akarere ka Rutsiro binjirire i Mushubati no mu kajyi ka Congo-Nile, bakomeze mu Gasiza na Muranda, bahite bazamuka umusozi wa Nyagihanika bakomeze i Bitare bagere ku karere ka Rutsiro, bazamukire kuri Nyamyumba basohokere mu mirima y’icyayi ya Pfunda.

Barahita bakata umuhanda ujya i Musanze banyuze Nkamira na Bazirete, binjire mu Karere ka Nyabihu bakomeze mu duce twa Kora na Sashwara, Jenda na Mukamira dutuwe n’abakunzi b’umukino wo gusiganwa ku magere benshi kuko abakinnyi benshi bawo ariho bavuka, basoreze i Musanze.

Ni intera irimo imisozi ine itangirwaho amanota y’ahazamuka; Nyamuhembe, Congo-Nile, Gakeri na Sashwara.

09:37

Kuwa kane, 28.02.2019

Abasiganwa 72 nibo bagiye guhaguruka ku isaha ya saa 10:00.


Abakinnyi bagiye guhaguruka ni 72 gusa kuko harimo abamaze gusezererwa mu isiganwa kubera kunanirwa gukurikira abari imbere.

Abo ni Tella Arthuce Jodele, Zang Ondoa Jacques na Yaou Gadji b’ikipe y’igihugu ya Cameroun, bivuga ko iyi kipe isigaranye abakinnyi babiri gusa mu isiganwa aribo Kamzong Clovis na Tientcheu Michel.

Abandi basezerewe mu isiganwa ni Umufaransa Gauthier Navarro ukinira Interpro Cycling Academy, Goldstein Omer ukomoka muri Israel ukinira Israel Cycling Academy na Martin Lavri?, Umunya-Slovenia ukinira Team Dimension Data for Qhubeka.

09:35

Kuwa kane, 28.02.2019

Abakomeje gukurikira Tour du Rwanda kuri IGIHE, turabaramukije!

Tubahaye ikaze ku munsi wa Gatanu w’isiganwa rizenguruka u Rwanda, Tour du Rwanda 2019. Aka gace karahaguruka i Karongi mu mujyi uri mu murenge wa Bwishyura gasorezwe i Musanze.
